content: Sponsored Post. When nesting tables within a TD, align center keeps it well, centered. Begin Template Container This holds everything together in a nice container Begin Template Wrapper This separates the preheader which usually contains the "open in browser, etc" content from the actual body of the email. Can alternatively contain the footer too, but I choose not to so that it stays outside of the border. end layout-widget-wrapper end widget-span Open Source Data Science Adoption: The How & Why  end layout-widget-wrapper end widget-span Open source technology is a powerful tool in the data science landscape, but most tech is hyper-specialized, and it's difficult to know which tool is right for your precise use case. Get the report on Enterprise Open Source Data Science Adoption which outlines the most popular open source tools for a host of jobs. Free download.


Sponsored Post.

Open Source Data Science Adoption: The How & Why 

Open source technology is a powerful tool in the data science landscape, but most tech is hyper-specialized, and it's difficult to know which tool is right for your precise use case.

That's where 451 Research comes in: their latest report Open for Business: Routes to Enterprise Open Source Data Science Adoption outlines the most popular open source tools for a host of jobs. And in the spirit of open source, we want to provide you with this report for free . Enjoy!
